testcase.name: Login with Valid Credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login Page..........................................passed When User enters valid username standard_user1234...........................passed And User enters valid password secret_sauce1234.............................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed

testcase.name: Login with Invalid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login Page..........................................passed When User enters invalid username "standard_user1234".......................passed And User enters invalid password "secret_sauce1234".........................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get propert error message..................................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login Page..........................................passed When User enters valid username "standard_user".............................passed And User enters invalid password "secret_sauce1234".........................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get propert error message..................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login Page..........................................passed When User enters valid username "standard_user1234".........................passed And User enters invalid password "secret_sauce".............................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get propert error message..................................passed

testcase.name: Login without any credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login Page..........................................passed When User dont enter any credentials........................................passed And User Clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User should get propert error message..................................passed
